Html:
Hot to get from MasterServer only specific game (appID) (ex. Counter-Strike 1.6).
If using filter GameDirectory = "cstrike", i get CS Source, but not Counter-Strike 1.6.

Hi MrLOLs,

QueryMaster 3.0 has been released.
IpFilter has also been updated.It now has AppId property.You can use that to filter by appid
